channel.title: EarthCraft Survival/Cities/Economy
channel.description:
EarthCraft
IP:Earthcraft.dyndns.org:25565
What is EarthCraft? A survival server that incorporates safe cities and plots to every member! It has a
free market economy! With warpzor, lwc, worldedit, worldguard, essentials, xspawn,
iconomy, and ServerSave so you will never lose the stuff you have built even if the
server does crash! 1. We have a friendly environment! 2. We have active Admins and Moderators! 3. We are always hiring Admins and Moderators! 4. We let free players have building right! 5. Scary wilderness and Safe Cities!
